com.io7m.jpismo.awt

Class PTextRendererAWTTrivial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jpismo.awt.PTextRendererAWTTrivial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PTextRendererType, PTypefaceDefaultsType

    @NotThreadSafe
public final class PTextRendererAWTTrivial
extends Object
implements PTextRendererType, PTypefaceDefaultsType
    A trivial implementation of the PTextRendererType interface that delegates to AWT for everything.
